author: colton darty
text: Choose to see the best in people, but don’t expect them to always be that way. Because we’re human, and we mess up. But still choose to see their best, even when they’re at their worst.

author: colton darty
text: Happiness will come to you when you let go of the hurt that is holding you back.

author: colton darty
text: It’s like when someone says, ‘How are you?’ Do you say, ‘Well, my head hurts and I’m lonely and depressed and I’m worried about everything and the world is collapsing and full of evil’? Or do you say, ‘I’m fine’?

author: colton darty
text: Happy Earth Day 🌎

author: colton darty
text: 🌹 a flower for everyone not feeling their best today

author: colton darty
text: having someone who is very patient and understanding with you, even on your hard days, is my form of a pure love language.

author: colton darty
text: Anyone who takes the time to be kind is beautiful.

author: colton darty
text: Always be a little unexpected.

author: colton darty
text: Some people need to open their small minds instead of their big mouths.

author: colton darty
text: Everything you want is on the other side of fear

author: colton darty
text: Life is about balance. Be kind, but don’t let people abuse you. Trust, but don’t be deceived. Be content, but never stop improving yourself.

author: colton darty
text: The moment you feel like you have to prove your worth to someone is the moment you absolutely and utterly have to walk away.

author: colton darty
text: After feeling disconnected for so long my mind and body are finally coming back to each other.

author: colton darty
text: Self-care is how you take your power back.

author: colton darty
text: Honestly, I don’t need someone who sees the good in me. I need someone who sees the bad in me and still wants me.

author: colton darty
text: Spend your free time the way you like, not the way you think you’re supposed to.

author: colton darty
text: To be kind is more important than to be right. Many times, what people need is not a brilliant mind that speaks but a special heart that listens.

author: colton darty
text: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality.

author: colton darty
text: Forgive me if I don’t talk much at times. It’s loud enough in my head.

author: colton darty
text:
These were the songs I had on repeat this year. What were yours? #SpotifyWrapped

author: colton darty
text: I am so afraid of disappointing the people I love, I often forget that I am someone I love too. And I need kindness just as much as I believe the people I love do.

author: colton darty
text: Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.

author: colton darty
text: I am trying to believe anyway that things will get better. Even though it feels like an empty hope and that every waking moment, all I know is to struggle to get through the day. It's okay. Things will get better. I know it

author: colton darty
text: They say that time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.

author: colton darty
text: Let someone love you just the way you are - as flawed as you might be, as unattractive as you sometimes feel, and as unaccomplished as you think you are. To believe you must hide of all the parts of you that are broken, out of fear that someone else is incapable of loving you...

author: colton darty
text: I’m a mess of a person but I’m loyal and I’ll love you with everything I have.

author: colton darty
text:
The question used to be, What's my life all about or what's my purpose?
Nowadays it's more, Why am I still here or wouldn't everything be better if I weren't here?

author: colton darty
text: A healthy relationship is where two independent people just make a deal that they will help the other person be the best version of themselves.

author: colton darty
text: You will find that most of the reasons you are afraid to do something are exactly the reasons why you should.

author: colton darty
text: I want to inspire people. One day I hope someone looks at me and says “because of you, I didn’t give up.”

author: colton darty
text: If I catch myself thinking negatively, I know it's only leftovers from the old me.

author: colton darty
text: Some people are going to leave but that’s not the end of your story. That’s the end of their part in your story.

author: colton darty
text: When you love what you have, you have everything you need.

author: colton darty
text: Did it hurt? When Steve from blues clues gave you more closure than your ex?

author: colton darty
text:
never made it as a wise man

couldn’t cut it as a dumb bitch either

author: colton darty
text: Having a soft heart in a cruel world is courage, not weakness.

author: colton darty
text: If you planted hope today in a heart that felt alone, if you caused a laugh that chased some tears away, if someone’s burden was made lighter because of your kindness, then your day was well spent.

author: colton darty
text: It's easier to think positive for others than for myself.

author: colton darty
text: It’s never too late to start over. If you weren’t happy with yesterday try something different today. Don’t stay stuck.

author: colton darty
text: Just because you don’t see results after a day, or even a week, don’t give up. You may not see changes, but every smart choice you make is affecting you in ways you’d never imagine.

author: colton darty
text: It's dark out. It raining and I'm lying I the grass with my doggie. So perfect rn.

author: colton darty
text: Just in case you have forgotten today: You matter. You are loved. You are worthy. You are magical.
